import { React, useState } from 'react' import { FaPlus, FaEllipsisV } from 'react-icons/fa' export default function AddUser() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [selectedUser, setSelectedUser] = useState(null); const [contextMenuUser, setContextMenuUser] = useState(null); const users = [ 'Joaquin Cantero', 'Vicente Alvarez', 'Vicente Rivera', 'Fernando Valdes', 'Juan Manuel Sepulveda', 'Juan Francisco Muñoz', 'Lukas Escobar', 'Lukas Escobar', ]; return (

Usuarios

{users.map((name, i) => (
{setSelectedUser(name); setShowModal(true); setContextMenuUser(null);}} className='relative flex flex-row justify-between items-center bg-gray-900 text-white p-4 rounded-xl border border-white/30 hover:bg-cyan-800 cursor-pointer flex-1'>

{name}

{contextMenuUser === name && (

Editar

)}
))}
{showModal && (

{selectedUser ? `Editar: ${selectedUser}` : 'Agregar Usuario'}

)}
); }
